name: Beetle Bunt
storyline:
Beetle Bunt is a puzzle game about a beetle that likes to flip things over. 
 
This game is about flipping objects over. Help Herc the beetle shove tablets under the light, revealing inscriptions on the other side. Beat challenging block rotation and block position puzzles while testing your platforming skills. 
 
Herc the beetle encounters several other beetles. Each beetle changes the puzzle in a unique and distinctly challenging way. Once you've mastered puzzles with just tablets, try puzzles with new beetles! This game is inspired by my love of insects. Herc is a Hercules Beetle or Dynastes Hercules.
summary: Beetle Bunt is a puzzle game about a beetle that likes to flip objects over. Help Herc the beetle shove tablets under the light, revealing inscriptions on the other side. Beat challenging block rotation and block position puzzles while testing your platforming skills.
